name: punycode-standalone
description: A standalone IE-friendly mod of the punycode@2.0.0 lib

scripts.babel: mkdirp dist/babel && babel ./node_modules/punycode/punycode.js --out-file dist/babel/punycode.js --presets es2015 --plugins transform-runtime
scripts.opt: node node_modules/requirejs/bin/r.js -o baseUrl=./dist/r name=punycode out=./dist/standalone/punycode.js paths.core-js=babel-runtime/node_modules/core-js optimize=none
scripts.all: npm run babel && npm run r-runtime && npm run r-punycode && npm run opt

author: Kristjan Peil
